code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./App.css";import ListToDoLists from"./ListTodoLists";import ToDoList from"./ToDoList";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[listSummaries,setListSummaries]=useState(null);const[selectedItem,setSelectedItem]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{reloadData().catch(console.error);},[]);async function reloadData(){const response=await axios.get("/api/lists");const data=await response.data;setListSummaries(data);}function handleNewToDoList(newName){const updateData=async()=>{const newListData={name:newName};await axios.post("/api/lists",newListData);reloadData().catch(console.error);};updateData();}function handleDeleteToDoList(id){const updateData=async()=>{await axios.delete("/api/lists/".concat(id));reloadData().catch(console.error);};updateData();}function handleSelectList(id){console.log("Selecting item",id);setSelectedItem(id);}function backToList(){setSelectedItem(null);reloadData().catch(console.error);}if(selectedItem===null){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListToDoLists,{listSummaries:listSummaries,handleSelectList:handleSelectList,handleNewToDoList:handleNewToDoList,handleDeleteToDoList:handleDeleteToDoList})});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToDoList,{listId:selectedItem,handleBackButton:backToList})});}}export default App;
